purpleculture_pinyin:
jiù
maternal uncle
дядя по матери
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 臼 indicates the sound; 男 (man) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
舅父 [ jiù fù ]: mother's brother; maternal uncle
舅妈 [ jiù mā ]: (coll.) aunt; maternal uncle's wife
舅母 [ jiù mǔ ]: wife of mother's brother; aunt; maternal uncle's wife
舅爷 [ jiù yé ]: father's maternal uncle; granduncle
大舅子 [ dà jiù zi ]: (coll.) wife's older brother

heisig_chinese_memo: Real men don't use mortars, said my mother's brother, as he began to grind some stones down using only his fists.
Ru_trainchinese: jiù: (сущ) брат матери, дядя; брат жены, шурин; отец мужа, свекор
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the man (男) with the mortar (臼) is your father-in-law
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Real men don't use mortars, said my mother's brother, as he began to grind some stones down using only his fists.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " male " and " mortal ", the original meaning is uncle, that is, mother's brother or younger brother. "Said Wen": "The mother's brother is 𦥶, and the wife's father is the outside 𦥶. From the male, the mortal voice." "Ritual ‧ mourning dress": "Uncle, Chuan said: Why do you want to follow?" Zheng Xuan's note: "(Uncle) mother's brother Kun."

" Uncle " can refer to the husband's father. "Book of Rites: Under the Tan Gong": "In the past, my uncle died of a tiger, and my husband died again, but now my son died again." Zheng Xuan's note: "The husband's father is called the uncle.

" Uncle " also refers to the wife's father. "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms·Shu·Xianzhu Biography": "Xiandi Uncle Chaqi General Dong Chengci is under the secret edict in the belt of the emperor." Pei Song's note: "Dong Cheng...Yu Xian is the master-in-law. Gaigu has no name of the father-in-law, so It's called uncle too."

" Uncle " can also refer to wife's brother or younger brother. "Warring States Policy‧Chu Policy IV": "Li Yuan is not ruling the country, so will Wang's uncle." Note: Li Yuanmei is the queen of Chu Kaorie.

" Uncle " was also used by princes in ancient times to call doctors of different surnames uncle. "Mandarin‧Jinyu III": "Is my uncle sick?" Wei Zhao's note: "The princes said that the doctors of different surnames called uncles.
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " male " and " mortal ", the original meaning is uncle, that is, mother's brother or younger brother.
humanum_full_description:
從「男」，「臼」聲，本義為舅父，即母之兄或弟。《說文》：「母之兄弟爲𦥶，妻之父爲外𦥶。从男，臼聲。」《儀禮‧喪服》：「舅，傳曰：何以緦？從服也。」鄭玄注：「（舅）母之昆弟。」

　　「舅」可指丈夫的父親。《禮記‧檀弓下》：「昔者吾舅死於虎，吾夫又死焉，今吾子又死焉。」鄭玄注：「夫之父曰舅。」

　　「舅」也指妻子的父親。《三國志‧蜀志‧先主傳》：「獻帝舅車騎將軍董承辭受帝衣帶中密詔。」裴松之注：「董承……於獻帝為丈人。蓋古無丈人之名，故謂之舅也。」

　　「舅」還可指妻子的兄或弟。《戰國策‧楚策四》：「李園不治國，王之舅也。」按：李園妹為楚考烈王后。

　　「舅」亦是古時諸侯稱異姓大夫為舅。《國語‧晉語三》：「舅所病也？」韋昭注：「諸侯謂異姓大夫曰舅。」
humanum_short_description: 從「男」，「臼」聲，本義為舅父，即母之兄或弟。

從「 男 」，「 臼 」聲，本義為舅父，即母之兄或弟。《說文》：「母之兄弟爲𦥶，妻之父爲外𦥶。从男，臼聲。」《儀禮‧喪服》：「舅，傳曰：何以緦？從服也。」鄭玄注：「（舅）母之昆弟。」 「 舅 」可指丈夫的父親。《禮記‧檀弓下》：「昔者吾舅死於虎，吾夫又死焉，今吾子又死焉。」鄭玄注：「夫之父曰舅。」 「 舅 」也指妻子的父親。《三國志‧蜀志‧先主傳》：「獻帝舅車騎將軍董承辭受帝衣帶中密詔。」裴松之注：「董承……於獻帝為丈人。蓋古無丈人之名，故謂之舅也。」 「 舅 」還可指妻子的兄或弟。《戰國策‧楚策四》：「李園不治國，王之舅也。」按：李園妹為楚考烈王后。 「 舅 」亦是古時諸侯稱異姓大夫為舅。《國語‧晉語三》：「舅所病也？」韋昭注：「諸侯謂異姓大夫曰舅。」
From the sound of " male" and " mortal", the original meaning is uncle, that is, mother's brother or younger brother. "Said Wen": "The mother's brother is 𦥶, and the wife's father is the outside 𦥶. From the male, the mortal voice." "Ritual ‧ mourning dress": "Uncle, Chuan said: Why do you want to follow?" Zheng Xuan's note: "(Uncle) mother's brother Kun." " Uncle" can refer to the husband's father. "Book of Rites: Under the Tan Gong": "In the past, my uncle died of a tiger, and my husband died again, but now my son died again." Zheng Xuan's note: "The husband's father is called the uncle. " Uncle" also refers to the wife's father. "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms·Shu·Xianzhu Biography": "Xiandi Uncle Chaqi General Dong Chengci is under the secret edict in the belt of the emperor." Pei Song's note: "Dong Cheng...Yu Xian is the master-in-law. Gaigu has no name of the father-in-law, so It's called uncle too." " Uncle" can also refer to wife's brother or younger brother. "Warring States Policy‧Chu Policy IV": "Li Yuan is not ruling the country, so will Wang's uncle." Note: Li Yuanmei is the queen of Chu Kaorie. " Uncle" was also used by princes in ancient times to call doctors of different surnames uncle. "Mandarin‧Jinyu III": "Is my uncle sick?" Wei Zhao's note: "The princes said that the doctors of different surnames called uncles.

舅字的基本解释

舅
jiù
母亲的弟兄：舅舅。舅父。舅母。
妻的弟兄：妻舅。
古代称丈夫的父亲：舅姑（公婆）。“昔者吾舅死于虎”。
古代帝王称异姓大邦诸侯为“伯舅”，异姓小邦诸侯为“叔舅”。诸侯亦称异姓大夫为“舅”。
mother's brother

舅字的源字形
舅字的起名意思

指母亲的弟或兄，或者妻子的弟或兄。

uncle
Basic explanation of words
uncle
jiù
Mother's brother: Uncle. uncle. aunt.
Wife’s brother: Wife-uncle.
Father who was called husband in ancient times: Uncle (in-law). "My uncle in the past died of a tiger."
The ancient emperors called the princes of different surnames "Uncles" and the princes of different surnames "Uncles". The princes also called doctors with different surnames "uncle".
mother's brother

uncle
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
uncle
Source glyph
uncle
Name meaning
Refers to the mother's brother or brother, or the wife's brother or brother.
jiù
сущ.
1) дядя (со стороны матери); вежл. дядюшка (в обращении)
2) свёкор
3) шурин (брат жены)
吾诸于幼, 得舅代我, 无忧矣 и дети ещё младенцы, и если ты, шурин, возьмёшь на себя все заботы о них, то мне не будет за них беспокойства
